model

Class InformationContainerStorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.InformationContainerStorer

  • public class InformationContainerStorer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class InformationContainerStorer is able to convert InformationContainer to byte arrays, save them encrypted in a file or restore information from a file and create InformationContainer of them.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int ARRAY_LEN
      The Constant ARRAY_LEN defines the size of one InformationContainer needs in a byte array.
      static int ENC_ARRAY_LEN
      The Constant ENC_ARRAY_LEN.

      The expanded password.
      private static java.lang.String STATE_FILE
      The Constant STATE_FILE.

      Creates the byte array from information container.

      Creates the information container from byte array.
      void loadFileList()
      Loads a saved file list from the STATE_FILE by creating InformationContainer from it an add them to the file list of FileListHandler.
      private InformationContainer loadInformationContainer(byte[] input)
      Load information container from given byte array by decrypting and converting it to an InformationContainer.

      Stores a file list of the FileListHandler encrypted by the users password to the STATE_FILE.
      private boolean storeInformationContainer(InformationContainer informationContainer, java.io.File outFile)
      Store given InformationContainer to given file by creating a byte array from it and encrypting it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InformationContainerStorer

        public InformationContainerStorer(java.lang.String userPassword)
        Instantiates a new information container storer. Expands the password to make it usable for encryptin and saves it.
        Parameters:
        userPassword - the users password

        public void loadFileList()
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                         java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                         java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                         javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                         javax.crypto.ShortBufferException,
                         javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                         javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                         java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Loads a saved file list from the STATE_FILE by creating InformationContainer from it an add them to the file list of FileListHandler.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - the invalid key exception
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - the no such algorithm exception
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - the no such provider exception
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - the no such padding exception

                                          java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Store given InformationContainer to given file by creating a byte array from it and encrypting it.

        true, if successful

                                                      javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                                      java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Load information container from given byte array by decrypting and converting it to an InformationContainer.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the created InformationContainer
